#summary The dir attribute specifies the direction of text (left-to-right or right-to-left).
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [DivElement <div> element] > *dir attribute*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

  * `ltr`: left-to-right text
  * `rtl`: right-to-left text

== Elements ==

You can use the `dir` attribute on any element.
